snippet: A Twitter Q. and A. meant to bolster publicity for Robin Thicke’s new album, “Paula,” inspired by the dissolution of his marriage, backfired as fans voiced their resentment.
abstract: Jon Caramanica Critic's Notebook column examines abortive Twitter Q&A that was meant to bolster publicity for new Robin Thick album by openly discussing the dissolution of his marriage; notes that session transformed into a wave of resentment about his sexually aggressive lyrics and marital indiscretions.
lead_paragraph: A Twitter Q. and A. meant to bolster publicity for Robin Thicke’s new album, “Paula,” inspired by the dissolution of his marriage, backfired as fans voiced their resentment.

headline.print_headline: Robin Thicke Hears the Vultures Tweet
headline.main: Robin Thicke Hears the Vultures Tweet
